channel.title: [IN DOWNOAD SECTION TO] Epicscape V1 [IN DOWNLOAD SECTION TO]
channel.description:
[size=20pt]NOW FOR DOWNLOAD[/size]
see downloads section
[size=16pt]Epicscape V1[/size]
My first server and its pretty good
100% customly coded by Elvemage 0o
Some Features
[ul][li]Working Ancients[/li] [li]Working tele-block[/li] [li]Working Playerban System[/li] [li]Comes with working compiler[/li] [li]Comes with working char deleter[/li] [li]Working ipban system[/li] [li]All teletabs work[/li] [li]Has player/Mod/Admin/Owner commands[/li][/ul]
Some Pictures:
Training area:
What it looks like on minimap
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/trainminimap.jpg[/img]
Now the three sections of training in training area
Barbarians (low level training)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/barbarianstraining.jpg[/img]
Experiments (medium level training)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/experimentstraining.jpg[/img]
Skeletal Dogs (higher level training)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/skeledogstraining.jpg[/img]
Pkbox
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/pkbox.jpg[/img]
Teampk (safezone)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/teampksafezone.jpg[/img]
Teampk (pk area)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/teampkwild.jpg[/img]
Modzone coming soon.. Still coding.. up in a day or 2
[size=16pt]Epicscape V1[/size]
[size=20pt]NOW FOR DOWNLOAD[/size]
see downloads section

item.title: [IN DOWNOAD SECTION TO] Epicscape V1 [IN DOWNLOAD SECTION TO]
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:3, topic:238197"]I’m not flaming or anything, just giving you tips.

Don’t stuff a bunch of Npc’s in a line, or a big amount of basically the same npcs standing next to each other.

Adding a mass amount of objects for an area doesn’t make it look any better or ‘cool’, all it’s doing is making it look worthless and cause lag.

Also, remove those Safe and Wilderness skull interface, it’s worthless unless you actually have Wilderness levels.[/quote]
^ All you need to know is quoted above.

Read full topic
item.source: [IN DOWNOAD SECTION TO] Epicscape V1 [IN DOWNLOAD SECTION TO]

item.title: [IN DOWNOAD SECTION TO] Epicscape V1 [IN DOWNLOAD SECTION TO]
item.dc:creator: @Corrupted_Chaos Corrupted_Chaos
item.description:
@Corrupted_Chaos wrote:

As Rich said, not packing the NPC’s together is always better. I’d suggest making a training area for each of the monsters.
Then making a tele to get to them [or portal]

Example - “Rats Lair” ect.

Honestly, the pking should just be the entire wild, being you’ve got no set 1v1.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN DOWNOAD SECTION TO] Epicscape V1 [IN DOWNLOAD SECTION TO]
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I’m not flaming or anything, just giving you tips.

Don’t stuff a bunch of Npc’s in a line, or a big amount of basically the same npcs standing next to each other.

Adding a mass amount of objects for an area doesn’t make it look any better or ‘cool’, all it’s doing is making it look worthless and cause lag.

Also, remove those Safe and Wilderness skull interface, it’s worthless unless you actually have Wilderness levels.

Read full topic
item.source: [IN DOWNOAD SECTION TO] Epicscape V1 [IN DOWNLOAD SECTION TO]
